name: BPM public test 1
description:
update a bug was found that you must press shoot before moving the cursor sorry for the inconvince

to flip the horseshoe crabs walk over them

CONTROLS  

wasd for gun

arrows for movement 

q and e slide 

space shoot 

CONTROLS CONTROLLER 

left joystick move 

right joystick aim

RT to shoot 

LT to jump 

RB and LB to slide
